task_name: Scaffold NestJS Project and Configure Linters
resource_notes: Standard project setup task, suitable for the assigned senior dev to establish patterns.

task_name: Define Core Identity & Access Entities with TypeORM
resource_notes: Requires clear understanding of the data model. Mid-level developer is appropriate.
alternative_approach: Senior dev could complete faster but is better utilized on security tasks.
risk_factors: Incorrect relationship definitions can cause major rework.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory schema review by senior developer (backend.dev1).

task_name: Implement User Creation and Password Hashing Logic
resource_notes: Critical security task. Requires senior expertise in password handling.
alternative_approach: None. Must be done by a senior resource.
risk_factors: Improper hashing implementation could lead to a major security breach.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security-focused code review by another senior or tech lead.

task_name: Integrate Token Generation and Event Publishing into Registration
resource_notes: Requires knowledge of asynchronous patterns and AWS integration.
risk_factors: Failure in event publishing could break the user verification flow.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a dead-letter queue (DLQ) for the event bus topic.

task_name: Implement Login gRPC Endpoint and Business Logic
resource_notes: Core authentication flow logic, requires senior oversight.
risk_factors: Security vulnerability in status checking (e.g., account enumeration).
mitigation_strategy: Strict code review to ensure generic error messages are returned for invalid credentials, regardless of account status.

task_name: Implement Logout Endpoint and JWT Blocklisting Logic
resource_notes: Requires understanding of JWT structure (jti) and Redis TTL.
alternative_approach: Senior dev could assist, but this is a good growth task for a mid-level dev.
risk_factors: Incorrect TTL calculation could lead to bloated Redis cache or premature token validation.
mitigation_strategy: Pair programming session with senior dev to validate logic.

resource_notes: Critical security component that affects all authenticated endpoints. Requires strong understanding of NestJS guards and error handling.
alternative_approach: Assigning to senior dev (backend.dev1) would be safer, but backend.dev2 can do it with a strict review.
risk_factors: A bug in this guard could break all authentication or allow invalidated tokens.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory code review by senior dev. Implement comprehensive integration tests for the guard.

task_name: Write E2E Test for Logout and Token Invalidation
resource_notes: Core validation for the entire logout flow.
risk_factors: Test instability if environment is not clean.
mitigation_strategy: Ensure E2E tests run against a clean, containerized instance of the application and its dependencies.
